ygData.subject: Re: {Guilds} Dragon Guild on Bertoxxulous?
ygData.msgSnippet: Aren t bards the only class that can worship Veeshan?
ygData.messageBody:
Aren't bards the only class that can worship Veeshan?

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Lori Martin [SMTP:LMartin@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, July 07, 1999 1:04 PM
> To: 'eqenchanters@onelist.com'
> Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] {Guilds} Dragon Guild on Bertoxxulous?
>
> Hmm... I've been very curious about Veeshan myself. I know very few who
> worship the Great Wyrm. How do NPCs feel about you? Are illusions
> difficult for you (some deities aren't liked by certain people, but I've
> never heard if anyone likes or doesn't like Veeshan)? Just curious,
> because I know it's a rarely chosen deity and very little information
> exists about the worship of the Dragon. I seriously considered
> Veeshan-worship, but wasn't sure how others would react to that.
>
> Dietrich of Neriak
> "The only thing more dangerous than a question is an answer"
>
> ----------
> From: rich.hitz@...[SMTP:rich.hitz@...]
> Reply To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Sent: Wednesday, July 07, 1999 10:54 AM
> To: EQ_Jewelers@onelist.com; eqenchanters@onelist.com;
> EQ-Enchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqenchanters] {Guilds} Dragon Guild on Bertoxxulous?
>
> From: rich.hitz@...
>
> Anyone out there know of a guild that worships Veeshan
> on the Bertoxxulous server? My wife and I are looking
> to join one but have yet to find one on Bert. Thanks
> for all your help. :)
>
> Artimis
> 2nd Rank Enchanter
> Bertoxxulous
>
